description: This file defines API routes for managing Student entities in a school management system. It provides CRUD operations such as listing, retrieving, creating, updating, patching, and deleting students, using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy.

methods.name: list_students( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list students, supports pagination via skip and limit.

methods.name: get_student(student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a single student by ID.

methods.name: create_student(payload: StudentCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new student.

methods.name: update_student( student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StudentUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to fully update a student by ID.

methods.name: patch_student( student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StudentUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Handles PATCH requests to partially update a student by ID.

methods.name: delete_student(student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a student by ID.

ctags.name: create_student
ctags.pattern: /^async def create_student(payload: StudentCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: delete_student
ctags.pattern: /^async def delete_student(student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: get_student
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_student(student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: list_students
ctags.signature: ( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000), )

ctags.name: patch_student
ctags.signature: ( student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StudentUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: update_student
ctags.signature: ( student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StudentUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
